name: John Smith
details: John Smith is a highly experienced English instructor with a passion for teaching. He holds a Master's degree in Linguistics and has been teaching English for over 10 years. John specializes in Business English and has helped numerous students improve their communication skills in professional settings.

name: Maria Rossi
details: Maria Rossi is a native Italian speaker and a dedicated instructor. She has a Bachelor's degree in Italian Literature and extensive experience in teaching Italian as a foreign language. Maria is known for her interactive teaching style and creates a lively and engaging learning environment for her students.

name: Hans Müller
details: Hans Müller is a certified German language instructor with a deep understanding of German grammar and culture. He has taught German to students of various proficiency levels for more than 8 years. Hans is known for his patient and structured approach, making complex concepts easy to comprehend.

name: Sophia Lee
details: Sophia Lee is a passionate Korean instructor with a talent for making the language accessible and enjoyable. She has lived in South Korea for several years, immersing herself in the culture and language. Sophia's teaching methods focus on practical conversational skills, helping her students gain confidence in speaking Korean.

name: Luca Bianchi
details: Luca Bianchi is an enthusiastic Italian instructor who loves to share his passion for the language and culture. He has a degree in Italian Language and Literature and has taught Italian to students of all ages. Luca's teaching approach emphasizes cultural immersion, ensuring students develop a deep understanding of Italy.
